about_the_game:
This soundtrack DLC includes the MP3 and FLAC versions of the Some Distant Memory soundtrack by Amos Roddy.

Track list:

01 The Place Below 02:27
02 Caverns 01:45
03 All Things Change 02:26
04 Descent 02:45
05 Projections 02:25
06 Something to Share 01:30
07 Echoes of Home 02:20
08 Lost Words 01:04
09 Last to Leave 01:11
10 Convergence 01:58
11 Remnants 01:39
12 Mira 03:13

Once purchased, the songs can be found in the Some Distant Memory folder in your Steam Directory: ..Steam\steamapps\common\Some Distant Memory
You can also access the files by right clicking on the game entry in your Library and select Manage > Browse Local Files
